reviews.name: Abdoel Samaai
reviews.review: Tara is the most dedicated person I've known & very much a perfectionist with all that she's does.

reviews.name: Amber-Kaye
reviews.review: She's super determined to finish any task that's handed to her even if she has to make some sacrifices which she will.

reviews.name: laeeq Majal
reviews.review: All i can say is that she is super confident and puts her best foot forward in everything she does.

reviews.name: Lyle Kepkey
reviews.review: A very focused person even though I do not know her that well but all I can say is that she is one determined.

reviews.name: Ridhaa Gabier
reviews.review: All in all, Tara is an invaluable asset to have on any team and I would highly recommend her to any organization looking for a dedicated and creative individual.
